ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Need settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Religion describes what is good and what is bad for your character and so depends on piety level character will be more or less religious. character with high piety would be more affected by sins and virtues.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Joining criteria settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Religion may have some criteria about the character. A character must have, or vice versa, not have these criteria in order to fit a particular religion.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Talks settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Religion talk is a recruiting ability of a follower of your religion to convert any other characters.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Mental breaks settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Character will lose his religion after this one.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Opinion settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Characters have an opinion about each other.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Death settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: People dies and that may affect on religion characters.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Kill settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Religious violence is violence that is motivated by, or in reaction to, religious precepts, texts, or doctrines of a target or attacker.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Weapon settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Some weapon may be a sacred or banned to kill someone with.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Food settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: There is food that will bring pleasure to your religious characters. And there may also be food that upsets them.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Apparel settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Apparel is holy or banned. Wearing certain robes can affect your character.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Allowed buildings settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Sacred buildings are the foundation of any temple in your colony.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Activity settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Worship is an act of religious devotion usually directed towards a deity.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Prayings settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Prayer is an invocation or act that seeks to activate a rapport with an object of worship through deliberate communication.

ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.label: Temperature settings
ReligionsOfRimworld.SettingsTagDef.description: Depending on the temperature level, your characters may feel a surge of faith, or vice versa, its absence.
